headline: Eaton to Participate in the UBS Global Industrials and Transportation Conference on December 2
summary: DUBLIN, November 18, 2025--Intelligent power management company Eaton (NYSE:ETN) today announced that its Chief Executive Officer, Paulo Ruiz, will participate in the UBS Global Industrials and Transportation Conference on December 2, 2025, at 9:40 a.m. Eastern time. Mr. Ruiz will speak to investors in a fireside chat about the company’s growth strategy in key end markets, such as data centers, utilities, aerospace and more.
